dict.acceptation: 湿的；下雨的；懦弱的；（儿童）尿湿尿布的；

sent.orig: Glue using a putty knife every cut surface, always wet to wet never wet to dry!
sent.trans: 胶浆使用油灰刀每裁减表面，总弄湿弄湿从未湿烘干！

sent.orig: Their idea was to connect connect the communities communities to wet wet Web by satlelightsatellite.
sent.trans: 他们的想法是用卫星将社区连接到网络。

sent.orig: Directions: Wet face. Leave face wet, the Self Heating Moisture Mask activated by water.
sent.trans: 简单的弄湿面颊，将自热保湿面膜敷在面上，面膜立即敷热面颊。

sent.orig: If Cymbidium is pregnant, we should keep it a little bit wet but not too wet.
sent.trans: 春兰孕蕾期，宜保持湿润，但也不能过湿。

sent.orig: The repulping of wet strength waste papers containing epoxy wet strength agents is difficult.
sent.trans: 使用了环氧类湿强剂的湿强废纸存在再制浆困难的问题。
